welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description: Welcome to the QZPay Playground! This guided tour will walk you through creating your first billing setup.

setup.title: Setup
setup.description: First, let's configure your payment mode. Choose 'Mock' for testing without real payments, or connect a real provider.

plans.title: Create Plans
plans.description: Plans define the different subscription tiers you offer. Create at least one plan to get started.

prices.title: Add Prices
prices.description: Prices define how much each plan costs. Add monthly or yearly pricing to your plans.

customers.title: Create Customers
customers.description: Customers are the users who will subscribe to your plans. Create a test customer to continue.

subscriptions.title: Create Subscription
subscriptions.description: Subscribe your test customer to a plan. This creates an active subscription relationship.

actions.title: Try Actions
actions.description: Now try some subscription actions like pausing, resuming, or canceling. See how the system responds.

events.title: View Events
events.description: Every action generates events. Check the Events view to see the timeline of what happened.

components.title: React Components
components.description: Explore the pre-built React components from @qazuor/qzpay-react that you can use in your app.

complete.title: Tour Complete!
complete.description: Congratulations! You've completed the guided tour and learned the basics of QZPay.

tips.label: Tip
tips.setup: Use Mock mode to test without real payments. You can switch to Stripe or MercadoPago later.
tips.plans: Start with 2-3 tiers like Free, Pro, and Enterprise. You can always add more later.
tips.prices: Consider offering both monthly and yearly pricing with a discount for annual subscriptions.
tips.customers: In production, customers are created automatically when users sign up.
tips.subscriptions: Subscriptions track the ongoing relationship between a customer and a plan.
tips.actions: Try canceling a subscription to see how the system handles it gracefully.
tips.events: Events are useful for debugging and building audit trails in production.
tips.components: These components work with any billing instance and can be styled to match your app.

complete.message: You're now ready to build amazing billing experiences with QZPay! Explore the playground to learn more.

welcome.tourDescription: New to QZPay? Take a guided tour to learn the basics.
